import React from "react"; import "./SearchList.css"; const Searchlist = [ { name: "Tower Street Apartments", distance: "500m", tag: "Free airport taxi", type: "Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 21m² 1 full bed", description: "Studio Apartment with Air conditioning", free_cancel: true, price: 112, rate: 8.9, rate_text: "Excellent", image_url: "./images/hotel_search_1.webp", }, { name: "Comfort Suites Airport", distance: "200m", tag: "Free Breakfast", type: "Entire studio • 2 bathroom • 100m² 2 full bed", description: "Studio Apartment", free_cancel: true, price: 140, rate: 9.3, rate_text: "Exceptional", image_url: "./images/hotel_search_2.jpg", }, { name: "Four Seasons Hotel", distance: "100m", tag: "Free Parking", type: "1 bathroom • 51m² 2 full bed", description: "Hotel in Lisbon", free_cancel: false, price: 99, rate: 8.8, rate_text: "Excellent", image_url: "./images/hotel_search_3.jpg", }, ]; function SearchList() { return (
{Searchlist.forEach((item) => {})} {/*
{Searchlist[0].image_url}

{Searchlist[0].name}

{Searchlist[0].distance} from center

{Searchlist[0].tag}

{Searchlist[0].description}

{Searchlist[0].type}

{Searchlist[0].free_cancel === true ? ( <>

Free cancellation

you can cancel later, so lock in this great price today

) : (

)}

{Searchlist[0].rate_text} {Searchlist[0].rate}

${Searchlist[0].price}

includes taxes and fees

See availability

*/}
); } export default SearchList;
